metadata.inclusion:
1. Bring the motion sensor within 3 feet from your controller.
2. Put your Z-Wave controller in inclusion mode.
3. Press and release the Z-Wave button on the motion sensor TWICE quickly (to lock and unlock it).
4. A new motion detection device should appear on your controller's dashboard
metadata.exclusion:
1. Bring the motion sensor within 3 feet from your controller.
2. Put your Z-Wave controller in exclusion mode.
3. Press and release the Z-Wave button on the motion sensor TWICE quickly (to lock and unlock it).
4. The device should disappear from your controller's dashboard.
metadata.reset:
If your primary controller is missing or inoperable, you may need to reset the device to factory settings. To complete the reset process manually, please press the Z-Wave SIX TIMES quickly (3 lock-unlock cycles).
NOTE: All previously recorded activity and custom settings will be erased from the deviceâ€™s memory.
